contenido: The Canon EOS-1V is a 35mm film single-lens reflex (SLR) camera that was introduced by Canon in 2000.
Carl Zeiss is a renowned German manufacturer of optical systems.
The Contax T2 is a high-end 35mm film compact camera produced by the Japanese company Kyocera under the Contax brand.
The Fujifilm Klasse is a high-end 35mm film compact camera that was introduced by Fuji in the late 1990s.
The Leica M2 is a classic 35mm rangefinder camera produced by the German company Leica.
The Leica M4-P is a 35mm film rangefinder camera produced by the German company Leica. It was introduced in 1980 and was part of the Leica M series.
